subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|ナツメ}} {{wp|Jujube}}
{{ja-kanjitab|なつめ|yomi=kun}} Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=なつめ|夏|tr1=natsu|t1=[[summer]]|芽|tr2=me|t2=[[bud]], [[sprout]]|nocat=1}}.'''2011''', Toshio Komatsu, Hideo Suzuki, {{lang|ja|新明解語源辞典}} (''Shin Meikai Gogen Jiten'') (in Japanese), {{w|Tokyo|Tōkyō}}: {{w|Sanseidō}}, {{ISBN|978-4-385-13990-6}}, page 689
